person:biography.personal-details:content:
My current position is Associate Professor with Department of Aquaculture, Faculty of Agriculture, Universiti Putra Malaysia.
I have 19 years of research experiences on Population Dynamics, Stock Assessment, Larval Fish Biology, RAS-Biofloc & Pisciponic System. Teaching courses are Ichthyology, Fisheries Stock Assessment and Management, Aquaculture Systems, Principle of Aquaculture & Fishery Science. By this time, I have supervised 29 postgraduate students (25 MS and 4 Ph.D). Consequently, I have been involved in conducting 31 research projects and 5 consultancy projects funded by different national and international organizations (1998-2018). Throughout my career, I have won several international and national awards for my innovative research and teaching contributions. Simultaneously, I have published 160 articles in peer reviewed journals, 13 refereed proceedings and six (6) books. My current h-index is nine (15) and total citations number is 1023.

keyword:keyword.keyword:content: Population Dynamics, Stock Assessment, Larval Fish Biology, RAS-Biofloc, Pisciponic
